text: new applications and features
often require you to combine data that
resides across multiple data stores
which necessitates manual work
and months of development time to access
replicate
and keep data up to date aws glue
elastic views makes it easy to combine
and replicate data across multiple data
stores without you having to write
custom code
it enables you to easily create
materialized views
across a wide variety of data stores
using familiar
sql aws glue elastic views
monitors for changes to data in your
source data stores continuously
and provides updates to your target data
stores automatically
since it's serverless it can scale
capacity up or down to accommodate your
workloads
learn more about aws glue elastic views
today
